description: This file defines a set of reusable UI card components for a React application, including Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardContent, and CardFooter, each with styling and layout logic.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: A generic container component with rounded corners, border, background, and shadow, accepting className and children props.

methods.name: CardHeader
methods.description: A header container component for the Card, styled with padding and vertical spacing.

methods.name: CardTitle
methods.description: A heading component for the Card, styled as a prominent title.

methods.name: CardContent
methods.description: A content container component with padding, used to hold main content.

methods.name: CardFooter
methods.description: A footer container component with padding and flex layout, used to place footer content.
